trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated Windows Phone Silverlight app users | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated Windows Phone Silverlight app users | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to send push notifications from Azure Mobile Services to specific users of your Windows Phone Silverlight app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to send push notifications from Azure Mobile Services to specific users of your Windows Phone Silverlight app.

trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated users
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated users

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticate user on any registered device.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticate user on any registered device.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the previous [Add push notifications to your app] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Unlike the previous [Add push notifications to your app] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.
trans-unit.target: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.
trans-unit.target: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial supports Windows Phone 8.0 and Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight apps.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial supports Windows Phone 8.0 and Windows Phone 8.1 Silverlight apps.

trans-unit.source: For Windows Phone 8.1 Store apps, see the <link><linkText>Windows Store version of this topic</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For Windows Phone 8.1 Store apps, see the <link><linkText>Windows Store version of this topic</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:

trans-unit.source: [Add authentication to your app]<html></html>Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target: [Add authentication to your app]<html></html>Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source: [Add push notifications to your app]<html></html>Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: [Add push notifications to your app]<html></html>Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Update the service to require authentication to register
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Update the service to require authentication to register

trans-unit.source: 5.
trans-unit.target: 5.

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click Save:
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click Save:

trans-unit.source: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Windows Phone (MPNS) app registrations created by the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Windows Phone (MPNS) app registrations created by the logged-in user.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Update the app to log in before registration
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Update the app to log in before registration

trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Test the app
